pkgmetadata.longdescription: Workbook-style, web-based interface to R // A workbook-style user interface to R through a web browser. Provides convenient interaction with an R process through HTML input elements, and plotting and other HTML output routines. Uses the Dojo toolkit (http://dojotoolkit.org) to help build responsive web pages with Javascript. Can be used with R in standalone mode or with a webserver to serve Rpad pages to other users.
